trans-unit.source: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 表示實體資料模型 (EDM) 至 ASP.NET 應用程式中的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction You can use the EntityDataSource control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介紹您可以使用 EntityDataSource 控制項以及在資料繫結控制項擷取 EDM 中的資料和顯示，請編輯，以及使用幾乎任何的程式碼來排序在網頁上的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[EntityDataSource Web 伺服器控制項概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                         ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> class with the provided connection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>類別所提供的連接。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> to the Entity Data Model (EDM).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>至實體資料模型 (EDM)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項會以動態方式建立 ORDER BY 子句中的值為基礎<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 屬性設定為`true`，您不應明確指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項建立 ORDER BY 子句，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>屬性不是 null。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項會以動態方式建立 WHERE 子句中定義的值為基礎<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*>

trans-unit.source: To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the AutoGenerateWhereClause property.
trans-unit.target: 若要篩選查詢結果所納入方程式實體類型屬性的運算式，您可以使用 AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateWhereClause property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生`WHERE`子句中的參數從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>每個參數的屬性必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AutoGenerateWhereClause property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性設定為`true`，您應該明確地指派`WHERE`子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A>

trans-unit.source: Example In the following example the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 範例在下列範例 AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>的屬性必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type.
trans-unit.target: 查詢會選取 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue SalesOrderHeader 實體類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生`WHERE`子句會藉由比較 TotalDue 值 TotalDueList 清單方塊控制項中選取值篩選查詢結果。

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:EntityDataSource ID="SalesOrderHeaderWithAutoParam" runat="server" ConnectionString="name=AdventureWorksEntities" DefaultContainerName="AdventureWorksEntities" EntitySetName="SalesOrderHeaders" Select="it.SalesOrderID, it.TotalDue" AutoGenerateWhereClause="True"> <WhereParameters> <asp:ControlParameter ControlID="TotalDueList" Name="TotalDue" PropertyName="SelectedValue" DbType="Decimal" /> </WhereParameters> </asp:EntityDataSource> ``` ## Example By default, the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:EntityDataSource ID="SalesOrderHeaderWithAutoParam" runat="server" ConnectionString="name=AdventureWorksEntities" DefaultContainerName="AdventureWorksEntities" EntitySetName="SalesOrderHeaders" Select="it.SalesOrderID, it.TotalDue" AutoGenerateWhereClause="True"> <WhereParameters> <asp:ControlParameter ControlID="TotalDueList" Name="TotalDue" PropertyName="SelectedValue" DbType="Decimal" /> </WhereParameters> </asp:EntityDataSource> ```# # 範例根據預設，AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause.
trans-unit.target: 這表示我們必須提供`WHERE`子句。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`totalDueParam 且參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項建立的 WHERE 子句，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateWhereClause 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*>屬性不是 null。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項支援的資料區段的執行階段導覽。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項支援自動查詢所傳回的資料進行分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The AutoPage property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls.
trans-unit.target: AutoPage 屬性是布林值屬性，指出是否啟用繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回的資料分頁。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> based on the information supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項新增至適當的查詢產生器方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>根據資訊提供給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>資料繫結控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the AutoPage property determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生資料頁屬性的值會決定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>支援資料來源的控制項是`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results.
trans-unit.target: 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This means that when you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A> property to define a projection and have AutoPage set to `true`, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to define the order or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這表示當您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>屬性來定義投影，並讓 AutoPage 設`true`，您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性來定義的順序，或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性`true`和加入 ORDER BY 參數，以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can page through the data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以逐頁查看資料。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports sorting the data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項支援在執行階段中排序資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項支援自動排序查詢所傳回的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The AutoSort property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls.
trans-unit.target: 自動排序屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項是布林值的屬性，指出是否啟用繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回之資料的排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> based on the information supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項新增至適當的查詢產生器方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>根據資訊提供給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>資料繫結控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the AutoSort property determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 自動排序屬性的值會決定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>支援資料來源的控制項是`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can sort the data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以排序資料。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter collection for the query.
trans-unit.target: 取得查詢的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: The CommandParameters property is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> of parameters that are passed to an explicit Entity SQL query that is specified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: CommandParameters 屬性用來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>參數傳遞至使用指定的明確 Entity SQL 查詢的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含傳遞至查詢命令的參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an Entity SQL command that defines the query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Entity SQL 命令定義查詢。

trans-unit.source: The CommandText property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression.
trans-unit.target: CommandText 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項可讓您指定使用自訂的 Entity SQL 運算式的查詢。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Like the SELECT statement, CommandText creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 陳述式，例如 CommandText 建立不是可更新的原始資料的預測。

trans-unit.source: When the CommandText property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 當指派的 CommandText 屬性時，則會停用更新、 插入和刪除功能。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the methods <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> of the related <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control all return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A>將相關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>控制所有傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the CommandText property is set, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method is called by a control that is data bound to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control if the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當設定 CommandText 屬性時，發生例外狀況時擲回<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>資料繫結至控制項所呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制如果的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CommandText is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: CommandText 的查詢，傳回的投影的屬性設 (例如，"`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>會傳回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that is the Entity SQL query.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the Deleted event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在刪除物件時發生錯誤，就會刪除事件引發，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>物件設為所傳回<xref:System.Exception>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>屬性設定為`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Deleted event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理的例外狀況已刪除的事件處理常式中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存檢視狀態中，您必須設定每個 HTTP 要求值。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when preparing to delete an object, the Deleting event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果準備的刪除的物件，正在刪除事件，就會引發和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>物件是設定為傳回<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>時發生錯誤

trans-unit.source: When you handle the exception in the Deleting event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理的例外狀況，正在刪除事件處理常式中時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the entity set used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所使用的實體集名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The EntitySetName property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is used to specify the entity set of the type of the objects that are accessed by the control.
trans-unit.target: EntitySetName 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項用來指定控制項所存取的物件類型的實體集。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the EntitySetName property is the default SELECT statement that is used by the control.
trans-unit.target: EntitySetName 屬性的值是預設的選取陳述式所使用的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The setting is not required if the query is specified as an Entity SQL expression that is supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為不必要的查詢會指定為 Entity SQL 運算式是提供給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Command Text (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂命令文字 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91)。

trans-unit.source: The entity set name.
trans-unit.target: 實體集名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定運算式，將查詢限制為只有特定衍生類型的結果。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control must return a specific derived type, the EntityTypeFilter property must also be set to specify the name of this derived type.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項必須傳回特定的衍生型別、 EntityTypeFilter 屬性也必須設定為指定此衍生型別的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A> property specifies an entity set that can generate polymorphic results, the EntityTypeFilter property is required to be able to edit data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A>屬性會指定實體集可能會產生多型結果，所以必須 EntityTypeFilter 屬性無法編輯資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This has the same effect as applying the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A> method to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這會有相同的效果套用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A>至<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>方法</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data binding is read-only, then the EntityTypeFilter property is not required.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結是唯讀，，則不需要 EntityTypeFilter 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the properties of the object returned by the query will be those of the default entity type for theentity set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，查詢所傳回之物件的屬性將會是 theentity 集的預設實體類型。

trans-unit.source: The filter expression.
trans-unit.target: 篩選運算式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與資料來源控制項相關聯的具名的資料來源檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports only one data source view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項支援只有一個資料來源檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Like all data source view objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> object that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying database, and performs operations, such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.
trans-unit.target: 就像所有的資料來源檢視物件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>定義其功能與資料來源控制項相關聯的物件時，會執行所有的工作都是從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料所需，且執行作業，例如排序、 插入、 刪除和更新。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports only one view, `viewName` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項只支援一個檢視，`viewName`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref>相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，表示清單的檢視表物件的名稱相關聯的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports only one view on its underlying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項只支援一個檢視其基礎資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method returns a single-element collection of this one-view name as a string.
trans-unit.target: GetViewNames 方法會傳回此一檢視名稱的單一項目集合，做為字串。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the names of the views associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含相關聯的檢視表名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定如何分組查詢結果的 Entity SQL 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The GROUP BY clause.
trans-unit.target: GROUP BY 子句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定要在查詢結果中包含的相關的物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The Include property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object.
trans-unit.target: Include 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項指定以逗號分隔清單的查詢路徑的定義以及特別是查詢的物件傳回的物件 thatare。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳遞字串中每個以逗號分隔的值，而不需修改，為個別呼叫<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>

trans-unit.source: This query is the source of the data regulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The Include property is the argument applied to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> before it is executed.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性是套用至引數<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>執行前。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the Include property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供給包含屬性的字串以字串傳遞給<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>使用相同的格式

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用查詢路徑以自動載入相關的物件的範例，請參閱[How to︰ 使用圖形結果的查詢路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。

trans-unit.source: When the Include property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding.
trans-unit.target: 當包含屬性用來指定查詢路徑中時，相關實體的屬性可以只用於唯讀資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關的物件沒有明確包含在查詢路徑中，屬性描述元是否仍然可供資料繫結，但屬性本身會傳回 null 值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須明確地以顯示其值載入相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 在查詢結果中傳回查詢路徑的逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源建立新的物件之後發生。

trans-unit.source: The Inserted event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 建立資料來源中加入的物件時，或將物件資料保存到資料來源時，發生錯誤，就會發生插入事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is used to access the added object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>物件用來存取已加入的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何與資料來源產生的值傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the Inserted event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件會保存到資料來源時發生錯誤，引發插入事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>物件設定為傳回<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Inserted event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理插入的事件處理常式的例外狀況時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在新的物件會保存到資料來源之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The Inserting event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 新的物件會保存到資料來源之前引發插入事件。

trans-unit.source: The Inserting event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入事件可讓您修改或確認要加入之物件、 新增不同的物件，或取消作業。

trans-unit.source: You can access the object to be added from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取的物件加入從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供不同的物件，使用者會負責設定正確的實體類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop the object from being added, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止從所加入的物件，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>物件`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when creating a new object, the Inserting event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立新的物件時，就會發生錯誤，引發插入事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>物件設定為傳回<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the exception in the Inserting event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理插入的事件處理常式的例外狀況時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得插入作業期間所使用的參數的集合。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存檢視狀態中，您必須設定每個 HTTP 要求值。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入作業期間所使用的參數。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control that need to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 載入中的屬性狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>需要保存的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains state information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含狀態資訊。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event handler to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref>事件處理常式來<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>包含控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to order the query results.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定如何排序查詢結果的 Entity SQL 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The OrderBy property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query.
trans-unit.target: OrderBy 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項是一個字串，代表 Entity SQL 查詢的運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This string is passed, without modification, to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個字串會傳遞，而不需修改，為<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.source: This query is the source of the data regulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the OrderBy property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 OrderBy 屬性的字串以字串傳遞給<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A>使用相同的格式

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用子句來排序查詢結果的範例，請參閱[如何︰ 排序資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。

trans-unit.source: The ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: ORDER BY 子句。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> assigned to the OrderByParameters property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>指派給 OrderByParameters 屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the OrderByParameters property requires that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query.
trans-unit.target: ORDER BY 子句，從 OrderByParameters 屬性建構要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>參數集合中屬性的識別從查詢傳回之項目的單一屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> creates an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> Entity SQL 查詢所指定的組態期間，會建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[套用 LINQ 查詢以 EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control that need to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 儲存中的屬性狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>需要保存的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains state information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含狀態資訊。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the projection that defines the properties to include in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定投射，可定義要在查詢結果中包含的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Select property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control contains a string that represents the statement of an Entity SQL query.
trans-unit.target: 選取屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項包含表示 Entity SQL 查詢的陳述式的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您預測一組指定的查詢所傳回物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This string is passed, without modification, to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個字串會傳遞，而不需修改，為<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.source: This query is the source of the data regulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the Select property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 為選取的屬性提供該字串使用相同的格式為傳遞給<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A>字串

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用子句來定義查詢投影的範例，請參閱[如何︰ 執行查詢，傳回匿名類型的物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。

trans-unit.source: Updates are not supported for projected data.
trans-unit.target: 預計的資料不支援更新。

trans-unit.source: This means that when you use the Select property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，當您使用選取的屬性來指定投影，繫結的資料繫結不支援更新。

trans-unit.source: When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results.
trans-unit.target: 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This means the when you set the Select property to defined a projection and have <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A> set to `true`, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to define the order or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這表示當您設定要定義投影之選取屬性，而且有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A>設`true`，您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性來定義的順序，或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性`true`和加入 ORDER BY 參數，以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Select cannot be set if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法設定選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>已啟用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Select is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果選取設定為傳回屬性之預測的查詢 (例如， `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>會傳回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數。

trans-unit.source: When the Select property specifies a query projection and the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a query has been executed.

trans-unit.source: The Selected event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned.
trans-unit.target: 在執行查詢，並在傳回資料之後，就會引發選取事件。

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果查詢準備或執行期間發生錯誤時，它也會引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object contains an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of objects that are returned from the query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>物件包含<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>的查詢所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the Selected event to retrieve and store returned entities in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼選取事件，擷取和儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>傳回實體

trans-unit.source: Do this to persist object changes on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這樣做可以保存的頁面上的物件變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>物件中所有頁面，不論分頁的資料繫結控制項所傳送的值顯示的物件總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>是只擷取資料繫結控制項需要它，例如，如果啟用分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the Selected event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果準備或執行查詢時，就會發生錯誤，則會引發選取事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>物件設為所傳回<xref:System.Exception>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>屬性設定為`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Selected event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理選取的事件處理常式的例外狀況時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the Selecting event to modify the configuration of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> object to `true` to cancel the query.

trans-unit.source: When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取的作業時，會不傳回任何資料，資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> invokes the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> query builder methods on <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> using the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`AllowPaging`設`true`在資料繫結控制項中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>叫用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A>查詢產生器方法上<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>上使用的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object can be changed when the Selecting event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果`AllowSorting`設`true`在資料繫結控制項中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件可以處理在 Selecting 事件時變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the Selecting event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他查詢運算子，例如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY、 網頁標記中指定會套用在 Selecting 事件引發之後。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the projection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建立投影的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> class, parameters can be passed to the projection that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>類別，參數可以傳遞至所定義的投影<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control specifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> that contains the parameters to supply to the SELECT statement of the query.
trans-unit.target: SelectParameters 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>，其中包含要提供資訊給查詢的 SELECT 陳述式的參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The SelectParameters property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectParameters 屬性用於具名引數提供給字串中所指定的參數是指<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SelectParametersproperty is not set, no parameter substitution is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定 SelectParametersproperty，會使用參數替代。

trans-unit.source: All the parameter names in the SELECT statement, prefixed by the "`@"` symbol`,` must have a matching name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 在 SELECT 陳述式前面加上的所有參數名稱"`@"`符號`,` <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>必須符合的名稱

trans-unit.source: Null values are not allowed for parameters in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>中的參數不允許 null 值

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the projection.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立投影參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該將資料來源的資料儲存在檢視狀態，以確定到資料已不變更另一個處理序之前更新或刪除。

trans-unit.source: To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ControlState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要追蹤變更時更新和刪除啟用作業時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制項必須儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ControlState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ControlState%2A>載入物件的原始值的相關資訊</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size.
trans-unit.target: 此必要的資訊儲存檢視狀態中，會增加的分頁大小。

trans-unit.source: You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the StoreOriginalValuesInViewState property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以停用檢視狀態中，儲存原始值，StoreOriginalValuesInViewState 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果這樣做，請[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]無法追蹤更新的物件中的並行存取。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[更新資料 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值會儲存在檢視，狀態。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the data-bound control that a parameter object has changed and the data-bound control needs to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 通知已變更的參數物件和資料繫結控制項需要重新整理的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致加入伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤，因此它們可以儲存在伺服器控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是透過可存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 物件的變更已經保存到資料來源之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The Updated event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes.
trans-unit.target: 已更新事件引發時已修改物件的變更會保存到資料來源，或套用變更時，發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is used to access the modified object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>物件用來存取已修改的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何伺服器產生的值傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the Updated event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更會保存到資料來源時，就會發生錯誤，會引發更新事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>物件設定為傳回<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Updated event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理的例外狀況已更新事件處理常式中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>
